rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space with natural light and Vastu-compliant entrance. It leads to the living area and home office.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: Open-plan combined living room and kitchen area with modern design elements, ample seating, and built-in storage solutions. The layout adheres to Vastu principles by maintaining proper north-south alignment.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated workspace with good natural lighting and a view of the garden. Placed in the eastern quadrant to enhance productivity as per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The largest bedroom ensuring privacy and comfort with south-facing windows for optimal sunlight balance. Incorporates Vastu guidelines for placement of the bed and seating area.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional bedroom offering ample space, designed with east-facing windows to harness early morning light as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Smaller bedroom optimized for children or guests. Maintains Vastu alignment with a west-facing orientation.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Compact bedroom suitable for additional guests, oriented to the north to ensure balance and calmness according to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Accessible from the master bedroom with privacy features. Designed in a west or south-west direction as recommended by Vastu for water elements.

openings.description: A modern sliding door to maintain space efficiency and ensure good air circulation.
Floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light and enhancing the open feel.
A dedicated door ensuring easy access while maintaining separation between workspace and living space.
Strategically placed for optimal morning sunlight as per Vastu recommendations.

additional_features.name: Rooftop Terrace
additional_features.description: A spacious terrace at the top level offering panoramic views and outdoor seating. Includes greenery and water features to balance Vastu energies.

notes: Total area approximated is designed to be around 800 sqft. Some areas may have flexible dimensions.
The design takes into account local Indian building norms, sustainability guidelines, and Vastu principles to enhance the flow of positive energy.
